name: part_002
file: tmp_【 3D LIVE 】The First Note【 #⁠音乃瀬奏生誕祭2025 】#hololiveDEV_IS #ReGLOSS [mt8AyISL9Ig]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_002.mov

scenes.description: Otonose Kanade addresses the audience after her opening performance, taking off her stage harness.
Kanade introduces her 3D birthday live event and the official hashtag.
Guests from ReGLOSS (Ririka, Raden, Ao) appear to congratulate Kanade.
The ReGLOSS members interact on stage and prepare for their group performance.

subtitles.original: イェーイ！
subtitles.english: Yay!

subtitles.original: いやもう大変だったわ、飛行機乗ってここまで来るのにさ。
subtitles.english: Wow, it was quite a struggle, getting all the way here by plane.

subtitles.original: ふーっ、疲れた。もう疲れたわ、私。
subtitles.english: Phew, I'm exhausted. I'm already wiped out.

subtitles.original: まって、とりあえず一応ハーネス取ってくるから、みんな待っててね！
subtitles.english: Hold on, I'm gonna go take off this harness for now, so everyone please wait!

subtitles.original: えい、見ないで！えい、えい...
subtitles.english: Hey, don't look! Hup, hup...

subtitles.original: はーい！
subtitles.english: Hi there!

subtitles.original: なったなった！
subtitles.english: I did it, I did it!

subtitles.original: えー、こちら音乃瀬奏生誕祭2025、ハッシュタグは...
subtitles.english: Uh, so this is the Otonose Kanade Birthday Celebration 2025, and the hashtag is...

subtitles.original: 同じです！あ、こっちに書いてある。こっちに書いてある通り...
subtitles.english: The same! Oh, it's written over here. Just like it says here...

subtitles.original: え、音乃瀬奏生誕祭2025でいっぱいポストしてください！
subtitles.english: Um, please post lots with #OtonoseKanadeBirthdayCelebration2025!

subtitles.original: お願いします！
subtitles.english: Please do!

subtitles.original: そして今回は3Dになって初めてのお誕生日なので...
subtitles.english: And since this is my first birthday after getting my 3D model...

subtitles.original: いろんな音乃瀬奏を皆さんに見てもらえたらなと思っています！
subtitles.english: I hope to show everyone many different sides of Kanade!

subtitles.original: そして最後には重大告知あり！
subtitles.english: And there's a major announcement at the end!

subtitles.original: よかったら最後まで見てください！
subtitles.english: So please watch until the very end!

subtitles.original: なんだなんだなんだなんだ...
subtitles.english: What's this, what's this, what's this...

subtitles.original: すごいコメントがもうすごい速度。
subtitles.english: The comments are coming in at an incredible speed.

subtitles.original: ありがとう！
subtitles.english: Thank you!

subtitles.original: そしてゲストパートは一部収録です。
subtitles.english: And the guest parts are partially pre-recorded.

subtitles.original: 生で歌ったり、えー、ダンスしたりもするので、よかったら見守ってください。
subtitles.english: We'll also be singing and dancing live, so please keep an eye on us.

subtitles.original: すごい草がいっぱいある。ありがとう！
subtitles.english: Wow, there's so much "grass" (lol). Thank you!

subtitles.original: 奏ちゃん！
subtitles.english: Kanade-chan!

subtitles.original: お誕生日おめでとう！
subtitles.english: Happy Birthday!

subtitles.original: おーー！
subtitles.english: Whoa--!

subtitles.original: 誰？誰？
subtitles.english: Who is it? Who is it?

subtitles.original: 誰だったかな？忘れちゃった。ReGLOSSのバイブスの人たちだ！
subtitles.english: Who was it? I forgot. It's the ReGLOSS vibe-checkers!

subtitles.original: え、来てくれたの？
subtitles.english: Wait, you guys came?

subtitles.original: もちろん！
subtitles.english: Of course!

subtitles.original: ありがとう！
subtitles.english: Thank you!

subtitles.original: そっち行くから待っててね！
subtitles.english: I'm coming over there, so wait for me!

subtitles.original: 来てくれるんだ！ありがとう！
subtitles.english: She's coming over! Thank you!

subtitles.original: やば、うちらも先にここ占拠しちゃってる。いいのかな。
subtitles.english: Whoops, we've already taken over this spot. Is that okay?

subtitles.original: 占拠なの？これ占拠してるの？三人で。もう今ジャックしたぜ。
subtitles.english: Takeover? Are we taking it over? The three of us. We've hijacked it now.

subtitles.original: 社長、社長、あ、落ちた...
subtitles.english: Shacho, Shacho, ah, I fell...

subtitles.original: そろそろ準備できたんじゃない？
subtitles.english: Everything should be ready now, right?

subtitles.original: え、もしかして歌うのか？え、歌うし踊るよ！
subtitles.english: Wait, are we singing? Yeah, we're singing and dancing!

subtitles.original: 歌うの？やるよ！
subtitles.english: Singing? Let's do it!

subtitles.original: 来るか？来るか？何が来るんだ？
subtitles.english: Is it coming? Is it coming? What's coming?

subtitles.original: 繋がっていたいって信じられる言葉 だってもう昨日の僕らにおさらば",
subtitles.english: Words I can believe in, wanting to stay connected, because we've already said goodbye to who we were yesterday

subtitles.original: 青い春を過ごした遠い稲妻
subtitles.english: The distant lightning of the blue spring days we spent

subtitles.original: ずっと泣いて前だけを向けたら きっとどんなに楽になれていただろうな
subtitles.english: If only I could have kept crying while looking straight ahead, I wonder how much easier it would have been

subtitles.original: この心を揺らした一縷の望みは
subtitles.english: The sliver of hope that shook this heart is...

subtitles.original: ないものねだりはやめた 未完成人間 素晴らしき世界だけが
subtitles.english: I've stopped wishing for what I don't have, an incomplete human, only this wonderful world...

subtitles.original: 答えを握ってる
subtitles.english: Holds the answer

subtitles.original: 諦めてしまうほどこの先たくさんの後悔が君を待ってるけど
subtitles.english: Though so many regrets await you ahead that you might feel like giving up...

subtitles.original: もう迷いはしないよ この傷も愛おしく思えてしまうほど
subtitles.english: I won't hesitate anymore, to the point where even these wounds start to feel precious

subtitles.original: 重ねてしまうよ 不恰好なままでいいから 走れ その歩幅で
subtitles.english: I'll keep layering them on, it's fine to be clumsy, just run, at your own pace

subtitles.original: 走れ 鼓動 鳴らしてくれ
subtitles.english: Run, let your heart beat

subtitles.original: 歌いたいと舞うは 同じくらい抱きしめて
subtitles.english: Dancing with the desire to sing, embrace it just as much

subtitles.original: 刻んだ今を 繋ぐ未来を目指して
subtitles.english: Aiming for the future that connects to the moment we've carved

subtitles.original: 顔も名前も知らない僕たちが たった一つの音を書き鳴らす
subtitles.english: We, who don't know each other's faces or names, strike a single note together

subtitles.original: いたずらみたいな奇跡のような刹那
subtitles.english: A moment like a prank, like a miracle

subtitles.original: あっという間に流れる時がありのままであり続けられる怖さが
subtitles.english: The fear that while time flows by in the blink of an eye, you can stay as you are

subtitles.original: 失った時間は取り戻せないけれど
subtitles.english: The time lost cannot be regained, but...

subtitles.original: 過去を振り返ってばかりじゃ 泣いたっていいんだ
subtitles.english: Don't just look back at the past, it's okay to cry

subtitles.original: 悔しさと痛みだけが 君を肯定するから
subtitles.english: Because only frustration and pain will validate you

subtitles.original: 大人になったら忘れてしまうの 君と約束をした場所は
subtitles.english: Will you forget once you've grown up? The place where I made a promise with you

subtitles.original: もう思い出したいよ 思い出も愛おしく思えてしまうほど
subtitles.english: I want to remember it now, to the point where even the memories feel precious
